text: KMYX-FM (92.5 FM, La Campesina 92.5 FM) is an American radio station broadcasting a Regional Mexican format. Licensed to Arvin, California, United States, it serves the Bakersfield area. The station is currently owned by Farmworker Educational Radio Network, Inc. ==External links== MYX-FM Category:Radio stations established in 1995 MYX-FM
title: KMYX-FM
